derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting the action of bringing back): from Old French, or from Latin reductio(n-), from reducere 'bring back, restore' (see reduce). The sense development was broadly similar to that of reduce; sense 1 dates from the late 17th cent

encyclopedia.content: 词典释义] n. 1. 减少；削减[(+in)] 2. 缩小[(+in)] 3. 下降，降低；降级[(+to)] 4. 缩图，缩。.. [网络释义]reduction 1.减少，降低，还原，复位 2.减少；削减 3.改编（缩编） 4.缩版；缩图 5.归钠 6.减保 7.简化 8.减数 Reduction 1.压缩，衰减，形成 2.减少 3.扣薪

entry.def: When there is a reduction in something, it is made smaller.

example.ex: ...a future reduction in UK interest rates...
Many companies have announced dramatic reductions in staff.
example.tran: 许多公司已经宣布大幅裁员。

entry.def: Reduction is the act of making something smaller in size or amount, or less in degree.

example.tran: 新的战略武器削减协议

means.word_mean: 1. the act of decreasing or reducing something
2. any process in which electrons are added to an atom or ion (as by removing oxygen or adding hydrogen); always occurs accompanied by oxidation of the reducing agent

stems_affixes.word_buile: accommodate向…提供住处+ion动作或状态等→accommodation住处,膳宿
communicate交流;通讯+ion动作或状态等→communication传达,信息
congratulate祝贺,庆贺+ion动作或状态等→congratulation祝词,贺辞
consolidate巩固,加强+ion动作或状态等→consolidation巩固,合并
correlate使相互关联+ion动作或状态等→correlation相互关系,相关[性]
dictate口述,口授+ion动作或状态等→dictation
elevate举起,提拔+ion动作或状态等→elevation上升,提高
eliminate除去;淘汰;排[删,消]除+ion动作或状态等→elimination排除,除去,消除,消灭

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
stems_affixes.word_buile: formulate用公式表示;系统地阐述+ion动作或状态等→formulation用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
imitate模仿+ion动作或状态等→imitation模仿,效法
introduce引入,介绍+tion动作或状态等→introduction介绍
irrigate灌溉+ion动作或状态等→irrigation灌溉
reduce减少,缩小+tion动作或状态等→reduction减少

stems_affixes.value_cn: 关系,联系,叙述,故事,亲戚
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ion动作或状态等→relation关系,联系,叙述
reproduce生殖;再现;繁殖+tion动作或状态等→n.繁殖,再现,复制品
requisite需要的+ion动作或状态等→requisition征用,要求

stems_affixes.value_cn: 翻译,译文,转化,调任,转换[物][数]平移
stems_affixes.word_buile: translate翻译,解释;转化+ion动作或状态等→translation翻译,译文,转化

Sentence.sentence: The authors documented an annual drop of as many as 120,000 cases of heart disease, 66,000 instances of stroke and 99,000 heart attacks caused by high blood pressure after a 3-g-per-day reduction in salt.
The team conducted a computer-based analysis to determine the impact a 3-g-per-day reduction in salt intake on rates of heart disease and death
access to nature contributes to the reduction of violence
If deficit reduction aggravates these biases, more Americans may choose not to have children or to have fewer children.
Budget reduction in around the corner
To appeal for tax reduction for raising children.
